name: Fly Fly Rocket !
description:
Tap or touch around rocket to move, collect gold coins and avoid aliens!

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive cool action escape game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
